entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 later in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
